metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5218 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in text-utils/colcrt.c in colcrt in util-linux before 2.27allows local users to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted file,related to the page global variable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdmainutils - 11.1.2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bsdmainutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '11.1.2ubuntu1').
